citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on January
8, 2026. Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file. The
inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on January 
8, 2026. Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file. The 
inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
